attributes.action: make Education better for people with Difficulties, Autism & Learning Disabilities & stop the Educational Authority from closing schools
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Who thinks education is not easy to find for people with Difficulties, Autism & Learning Disabilities nearby/local to your home/town/village in some places?

Who thinks education would be better and easier if the government would provide more education and also stop Educational Authority closing down schools?
